[Desc]               <blue>Your name is Dave and lately your life hasn't been so great.  You are having what might be considered a midlife crises.  You just have an itch, a yearning for something different than this depressing single life.  Either that or a big hefty sum of cash, maybe tour the country, see some concerts of bands you were into 25 years ago, whatever.  This gameshow claims to offer both cash and change, and even if you lose you'll get one or the other, so why the hell not?  You are a balding, single, 42-year old man who has put on a number of pounds in the past decade, a far cry from the stud you were back in the good old college days.  What's the worst that could happen?</blue>;
[LoseDesc]               <pink>You stare at your new body in a mirror.  You are an 18-year-old brunette teenage girl with a decent pair of breasts, a fine body, a sensitive vagina... and you are pregnant.  You never would have thought a trillion years your life would take a turn like this!  You thought you knew it all only to learn how wrong you were.  You are scared for the future, but you see your boyfriend--has reality changed?  It must have--jumping from the audience down to greet you.  With a warm embrace you know that life will be tough and full of surprises, but for the first time in a very long time you are happy and look forward to what the future has in store for you.</pink>;
